A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All these negative user reviews are all saying basically the same thing\, \"It was different and I don't like change!! \"  I believe the argument from the last movie was that it was just a retread of Star Wars:A New Hope.  Now they are complaining because it subverted their expectations.  And all the negative viewer ratings are 1/2 stars.  It seems suspicious that all the negative reviews are so similar in rating and messaging. \n\nMy family and I thoroughly enjoyed the movie.  It was a great ensemble movie. Can't wait for the next one!
